name: Donuts Drift - Slide Drifting
description:
It’s time to drift again… and again… and again with the best new drift game! Spin donuts, avoid obstacles and see how far you can get!
 
Donuts Drift lets you do unlimited drifts and reach new records with just a tap! Tap left and right to get that perfect drift and see how many donuts you can spin.

Burn rubber in this free game as you spin out with new cars and boosts. Avoid obstacles and see how many donuts you can spin. 

Collect coins with each drift and use it to upgrade your driving experience and earn extra fuel.
 
Donut Drift is a fun and addictive game that is very simple to learn. See if you can beat your high score and drift your way to the top of the leaderboard! Play offline wherever you are, or go online and boost your rank.

Hit the road and start drifting donuts today!
 
DONUTS DRIFT FEATURES:

DONUT SPINNING GAME
- Simple but challenging tap gameplay
- Tap to drift and see how many donuts you can spin!
- Drive and drift as far as you can to set an awesome record
- Avoid obstacles along your way
 
LEVEL UP YOUR RIDE
- Unlock different car designs and drift your way!
- Collect coins and earn more fuel
- Pick up boosts and power up your ride

FUN AND ADDICTING GAME
- Earn Drift Coins even while offline!
- Minimalist design that is pleasing to the eyes
- Aim for a high score and rank up
- Play with no WiFi
 
Be the one and only Drift King! Download Donuts Drift now and start the fun!
